name: MedicationRequest.encounter
title: MedicationRequest.encounter
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: Encounter created as part of encounter/admission/stay
element.definition: The Encounter during which this [x] was created or to which the creation of this record is tightly associated.
element.comment: This will typically be the encounter the event occurred within, but some activities may be initiated prior to or after the official completion of an encounter but still be tied to the context of the encounter."    If there is a need to link to episodes of care they will be handled with an extension.

mapping.map: .inboundRelationship[typeCode=COMP].source[classCode=ENC, moodCode=EVN, code="type of encounter or episode"]
